title: 8/4/17 - Hextech Crafting Failed To Redeem
body:
[](https://i.gyazo.com/4ad644d48fa969161e193be6a4abc25f.png)
Morning everyone,

> **Update 10:30am Pacific - 
> **
We believe the issue should be resolved now!  Restart your client and try again to redeem your goodies!

Thanks for the reports regarding the hextech crafting issues this morning!  It looks like some players are receiving a** Redemption Failed** error when trying to fuse or unlock content.  The issue has been fielded to the proper team to investigate and resolve as soon as they can!

http://i.imgur.com/QuVJwvU.png

**Update @ 9:50am Pacific**:  I've also seen reports of players who received a notification that hextech content was unlocked into their inventory, though redemption still fails.  We're looking into these as well!

http://i.imgur.com/YAoLwJt.png

In the meantime, you might be able to spam redemption to get the error to budge through.  Otherwise, hang tight!  

We'll post updates as they come!  Our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) has also been updated with current news.

replies.body: Yep! Also having this error unlocking Guqin Sona =) Thank you for making this post/update!
Hey there, can you try again and let me know if you're still getting an error?

Yep! Gimmie a sec =)
EDIT: Worked perfectly! Thank you for the fix <3
Took roughly 40 attempts over 4 restarts in 2 days, but my Omega icon finally unlocked. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Thanks for the report!  It's possible that the issue came back this morning, so I'm looking into this.  For now, can you try spamming redemption and let me know if it budges through for you?  Based on what I've seen so far, if you keep trying it should eventually work.
Hi I'm still having this problem with other icons that are not the Omega one. I have a Dragon icon in my Loot and it won't unlock.
Hey there!  Have you since restarted the client?  If no, try that and let me know.  Which content were you trying to unlock?
Having the same problem with the Omega Squad icon redemption. Thanks for the updates!
I had rerolled some champ shards and got Ahri but she doesn't appear as an own champ. Will this be fixed once the problem with loot is solved? It didn't say that the crafting failed or anything
I do see that you successfully rerolled your shards into Ahri, and she should still be in your inventory.  Once this issue is resolved, you should be able to unlock her permanently!
